price: 108. Iyagoo ku dhex waaraya weligood mana doonaan inay xaggeeda ka wareegaan (guuraan).
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
